name: Customize your Drag-n-Drop System – Limitless
author: diegpl, pkelbert, gmax21

sections.description:
This is a plugin for Limitless theme: http://themeforest.net/item/limitless-multipurpose-drag-n-drop-theme/5528738
Add Black and white effect for your portfolio, remove their links and customize your sticky contact link at the sidebar

Our sites:
http://userdev.com.br

http://wpsoftwares.com

http://wpsoft.com.br

Arbitrary section

Markdown

  1. Get more effects at limitless
  2. Get a customized link for your sticky contact form
sections.installation:
1. Open customize-limitless.js
  2. Update jQuery(“.inner-super-wrapper”).append(“

<

div class=’sticky-contact’><a href=’http://atacomunicacao.com.br/contato/’ … with the link you want
3. Insert your portfolio items at the control panel
4. Upload it to plugins folder (/wp-content/plugins/)
5. Activate the plugin
6. It is done. Use it!!!
sections.faq:
What is missing on this plugin?

Integration in the back-end with a data-base
